review.comment:
They did a really good job deleting all the chrome on my truck. They're all very nice and helpful.
And theres a 5 year warranty!!! That's awesome!!!
review.review_reply: Hey Denae - thank you for your kind words. We're always happy to help!

review.comment: A BIG THANK YOU to Colin and the whole team over at Wrap Guys for always making the wrapping of our company vehicles such a smooth process. Right from the design process to the final installation, they have always taken very good care of us. We will always be Wrap Guys customers and we have referred many others already. No need to look elsewhere!
review.review_reply: Wow! Thank you for all of your kind words and the thoughtful review. We really appreciate you and your team. :)

review.comment: Vernon and Terence are great guys. Thanks for all your help with wall, window, and vehicle wraps!
review.review_reply: Hey, Sam. Thank you so much! We really appreciate your kind words and review.

review.comment: AAA service . Professional work.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review, Chris! We appreciate the kind words. :)
Thank you for your review, Ling.

review.reviewer_display_name: Lee Erwin Three Hands In Band
review.comment: Truck wrap did not turn out as hoped.  Wrapguys more interested in getting paid that correcting errors, minimal effort. Do not use.
review.review_reply: Hi Lee. First of all, thank you for taking the time to review us on Google. We’re usually well known for our quality work and attention to detail so we’re sorry to hear that we missed the mark with your experience. We’ve been trying to reach you for the last couple of weeks as we’d like to make this right for you. Could you please give us a call at 604-996-6389? Thank you.

review.comment: Fatima Zahra Helping Hand sincerely thanks the Wrap Guys for an amazing job on our Mobile Food Relief Van! The highly-visible and exceptional quality wrap enables us to distribute food and supplies while creating awareness for those less fortunate. From customer service to design, it was a pleasure to work with the entire team!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words and review. This was great to read. Enjoy the new wrap!

review.comment: Great team, highest level of professionalism every step of the way and unbelievable prices. You definitely won't be disappointed and I would recommend them to everyone.
review.review_reply: Hi Gerald. Thank you for the kind words and 5-star Google review.

review.comment: Wrapguys tand by their work, Colin and Vern gave me tremendous customer service. I have issues with the Graphic designer that was assigned to my job. A few things that I thought could have been handled better but excellent job on the actual application and Colin and Vern made sure it was made right!.
review.review_reply: Hi Ed. First of all, thank you for taking the time to review us on Google. We really appreciate your honest feedback. Customer service is so important to us and we are pleased to hear that everything was made right. Thank you.

review.comment:
After the best experience i have ever had dealing with a company...the wrap guys....i decided to go for a second round a year later.  Colin the owner, Evan the designer and the rest of their team took their service they delivered me to a while new level. These guys do top notch work, stand behind their work 200 percent and take the very best care of their customers....all while being the most affordable design and wrap company on the market today.  I picked up my second unit with the new wrap and design, dropping off a third unit to wrap and cant wait to get our pick up truck designed and wrapped next!
Thanks for the super work and terrific customer-service experience guys!
review.review_reply: Wow! We are so blown away by your kind words and recommendation. Thank you so much, Edward. It's our pleasure. :)

review.comment: These guys are absolutely fantastic.  Professional and courteous. I was given misinformation about how long wrapping takes, but Colin patiently explained the whole process to me.  I would recommend them to anyone!
review.review_reply: Hey Andrea. Thank you for taking the time to review us on Google. We appreciate it!

review.comment: These guys are the best in town. Colin and his staff are top shelf. Not only is their workmanship and attention to detail spot on but the customer service they provide keeps me coming back. I've used Wrap Guys on several occasions and would have no problem recommending them to anyone.  Thanks again Colin and staff!!
review.review_reply: Hi Tim. Thank you for taking the time to review us on Google. We really appreciate your kind words and recommendation.

review.comment: Wrapguys has done about 10 vehicles for us, and we have never been disappointed.  Amazing service, always accommodating and follows thru on their quotes and promises.  I would recommend Wrapguys 100 %
review.review_reply: Thank you, Diana. We really appreciate your kind words and recommendation. :)

review.comment: We at DMC contracting have three of our very large trailers fully wrapped and have now had four vehicles wrapped from the Wrap Guys. Colin is a great communicator and on top of things. Always been a good experience and will be happy to come back and would recommend Colin and his team
review.review_reply: Thank you for your recommendation, Dan. Looking forward to the next wrap!

review.comment: Wrap guys are passionate about what they do; it shows in both their quality of the work and in their level of customer service. Their custom work exceeded my expectations.
review.review_reply: Hi Jason. Thank you the kind words and for taking the time to review us on Google.

review.comment: Wrap Guys have done a fantastic job wrapping our entire fleet. The materials they use are high-quality and durable so the trucks we've wrapped last year still look great.

review.comment: Amazing experience!! All the staff were so helpful

review.comment: Was good 👍

Great job wrappers!

review.comment: So appreciated the professionalism and the effort to go above and beyond. They work hard to make sure customer is satisfied and receives an exceptional product. Went out of their way to provide extra help for my kids theatre production.

review.comment: Good Co-worker they're very friendly,kind and helpful

review.comment: Always a great experience. They are professional and know how to work with any accessory on your vehicle. Tenacity to get it right the first time. I’ll always go back to wrap guys!
review.review_reply: Thanks, Jay! We greatly appreciate your kind words and review.

review.comment: Excellent work, great service and very creative ideas! Our vehicle looks amazing! I would highly recommend them.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much, Steve. Enjoy the new wrap!

review.comment: A professional seamless wrap in Satin Black, done in a timely manner by people who care about their craft. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for your kind words and review. Enjoy the new wrap!

review.comment:
We've used Wrap Guys for the past 6+ years for the wrap on our 24 passenger shuttle bus. Colin has always been great to work with - excellent service and quality work at competitive prices. I would not hesitate to recommend!

Gail Terry
General Manager
Richmond Auto Mall
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words and review, Gail! It's always a pleasure.

review.comment:
Amazing job, professional front desk staff, timely install and kept me well informed with progress.  I’m a person who hates chrome they were able to do a great job covering it up on my front forks!

Turned out amazing I think! I will recommending them to anyone.
review.review_reply: Thank you, Steve. We're so happy to hear this. Enjoy the new wrap!

review.comment: Love to support local businesses as much as possible. Can’t say enough about how great and professional these guys are. I had a relatively small job for them compared to what they usually do yet they treated me as if I was just as important as a huge job. Quality work on top of that. Very happy with the result. Got my plastic fake chrome window trim wrapped in black to match the rest of my car. Highly recommend these guys!
review.review_reply: Hey Marty! Thank you very much for your kind words and review!
Thank you for the review!

review.comment: Wrappguys is the one to go to for a full service wrap... they did an amazing job on mine and they have great customer service.  Check them out!!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words and review, Robin!

review.comment:
Despite the glowing Google reviews I'm quite disappointed with Wrap Guys.

Brought my trailer to be wrapped and asked twice how long it would take and they assured me "oh one day is enough! it'll be done in a day" (Obviously wasn't)

When I got the trailer the entire back side had the words on the wrong order. It didn't make sense or was not like the proof.

They said they would fix it but would take 4-5 hours so I drove back out to Vancouver and drove back in AGAIN to pick it up.

After getting it back out to Vancouver, there was ANOTHER mistake. And it took them over a week to get someone out here to fix it.

At the end of the day, the wrapping is nice but I wasted so much time driving back and forth from Vancouver to Langley because of these careless mistakes that shouldn't have happened. So overall very disappointed.
review.review_reply: Hi Kelly. First of all, thank you for taking the time to review us. We're usually known for our fast turnaround times and attention to detail, so we're sorry to hear that we missed the mark with your experience. We hope you can give us another chance to earn a 5-star review from you in the future. Please give us a call at 604-996-6389. Thank you.

review.comment: Great job done on my camper   Very fast and efficient.  Jayme was great at communicating and finding the right design I needed for my project.  Would definitely work with them again
review.review_reply: Thank you, Lisa! We appreciate you taking the time to review us on Google. We hope you enjoy your new wrap!

review.comment: Amazing service and workmanship, my company fleet vans were done from Wrap Guys and definitely coming back in the future!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much, Pardeep! We greatly appreciate your kind words and review. Please enjoy the new wraps!

review.comment:
Huge shout out to Evan and the team at Wrap Guys. There eye to detail on the work done on our work trucks was incredible. Couldn't of been more happy with the finished product.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
review.review_reply: Hey Kyle! Thank you very much for your kind words and review. Enjoy the new wraps!

review.comment: Colin and his team did an amazing job wrapping my vehicle. I’m sure this will greatly improve my visibility and enhance my marketing needs.thanks wrap guys.
review.review_reply: Hey Derek! This is great to hear. Thank you so much for taking the time to review us on Google. Enjoy the new wrap!

review.comment: I’d recommend using the Wrap Guys. They worked with a tight timeline and did a great job!
review.review_reply: Thank you, David. We greatly appreciate your review and recommendation!

review.comment: Good guys to work. Friendly team with good value & quality. I would definitely recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you, Mike. We really appreciate your review and recommendation!

review.comment: After a very poor initial experience with another vehicle wrap company, I contacted Owner, Colin Gillette at Wrap Guys, hoping for a turn around. I have a general contracting/construction company, FirCrest Developments, and I needed a professional looking wrap for my new truck. In the construction industry, vehicles are one of your most effective methods of advertising, so quality and timeliness were critical. Right from the beginning, Colin was excited about our project and assured us we'd be very happy with the final result. We worked with superstar Lead Designer, Devon, whose graphic design talents and positive attitude made for a smooth, collaborative process. The install team did a phenomenal job and had the vehicle wrapped exactly according to schedule. Everything from the final sign-offs to the payment process was easy and professional. If you need a vehicle wrap done, make Wrap Guys your first and best choice!
review.review_reply: Hey Jack! Thank you so much for sharing your experience and taking the time to review us on Google. We're so happy to read this. Enjoy your new wrap!

review.comment: From the very beginning when I requested  design and till the end when I picked up my wrapped van, there was a friendly and customer oriented communication. There is only one disadvantage I found: location. Overall experience was positive.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words and 5-star Google review, Andrey!

review.comment: They did an amazing job. Very helpful and easy to deal with. They accomidated my unique drop kff and pickup schedule and the wrap is perfect. Will ise them next time and if you need a wrap you should use them
review.review_reply: Hey Joe. Thank you very much for taking the time to review us on Google. Enjoy your new wrap!

review.comment: From start to finish Colin (owner) Evan and the Wrap Guys Team was wonderful to work with. He delivered exactly what I envisioned and he kept in touch with me throughout the entire process. The are by far the best pricing and they do such amazing work. I would recommend Wrap Guys in a heartbeat. Keep up the amazing work.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for your kind words, recommendation and review!
Thank you for your review!

review.comment: Phenomenal service and phenomenal work. From start to finish, we couldn't have asked for a better experience. Communication was very informative and concise while still offering added support as needed. We presented our initial draft thinking it would be good to go, but our designer Devon really amped up the design and added the right amount of detail and flavor that really brought the vision to life. Lastly, as a new business starting up we were thrilled to not only have chosen Wrap Guys for their excellent service and design skills -but affordability as well. Quality of work is never compromised while providing affordability. Happy to have discovered this local business. Highly, highly recommend.
review.review_reply: This was so nice to read. Thank you very much for your kind words and review, Jacqueline. Enjoy the new wrap!
Thank you for the review, Waleed.

review.comment: From design to producing the actual product, Vernon and his team were fantastic to deal with. Great communication, professional, and worked around my budget. Jayme came up with this head-turning design and strategically made use of the whole van area. I was totally thrilled and still is everytime I drive this! Thanks you guys!
review.review_reply: That is so great to hear. Thank you very much for the kind words and review!

review.comment:
I would like to rate them with more than 5 stars. It was our first time wrapping our car and Vernon not only responded and work very quickly but he clear all our doubts. Very easy to work with and we don't have words to express how much we loved the design. Evan designed exactly what we are looking for.
We highly recommend them and definitely, we'll work in the near future with Wrapguys again!
review.review_reply: Hi Noelle. Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience and review us on Google. This was great to read. Enjoy your new wrap!

review.comment: My experience with Wrap Guys was excellent from start to finish. When I sent in photos of each side of my new cargo trailer, they had proofs made and emailed for my approval and then were able to do the work within a week. Polite to talk to, quick turn around, and quality work. The trailer looks great! Highly recommended to others looking to get your vehicle or trailers wrapped.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the kind words and review. Enjoy the new trailer wrap!
